title: Law removing the National Commission for the Fight against Genocide
title_en: Law removing the National Commission for the Fight against Genocide

provisions.title: Article One – Removing the National Commission for the Fight against Genocide
provisions.content: The National Commission for the Fight against Genocide is removed.

provisions.title: Article 2 – Public servants that were employed by the National Commission for the Fight against Genocide
provisions.content: Public servants that were employed by the National Commission for the Fight against Genocide are placed in accorandance with laws governing public servants.

provisions.title: Article 3 – Property, contracts and liabilities
provisions.content: Property, contracts and liabilities of the former National Commission for the Fight against Genocide are transferred to the Ministry in charge of National Unity and Civic Engagement.

provisions.title: Article 4 – Drafting, consideration and adoption of this Law
provisions.content: This Law was drafted, considered and adopted in Ikinyarwanda.

provisions.title: Article 5 – Repealing a law and all prior legal provisions contrary to this Law
provisions.content: Law n° 015/2021 of 03/03/2021 governing the National Commission for the Fight against Genocide and all prior legal provisions contrary to this Law are repealed.

provisions.title: Article 6 – Commencement
provisions.content: This Law comes into force on the date of its publication in the Official Gazette of the Republic of Rwanda.
